top_categories.workout_context: UCI Gravel Dustman’s gravel roads demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing UCI Gravel Dustman isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
UCI Gravel Dustman rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
At 81 miles, UCI Gravel Dustman punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of UCI Gravel Dustman. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at UCI Gravel Dustman when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
UCI Gravel Dustman’s mixed gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at UCI Gravel Dustman — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at UCI Gravel Dustman — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on mixed gravel.
Every session at UCI Gravel Dustman intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for UCI Gravel Dustman — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what UCI Gravel Dustman’s mixed gravel delivers on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for UCI Gravel Dustman’s 81 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at UCI Gravel Dustman requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on mixed gravel to build confidence. Expect: gravel roads.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 81 miles of mixed gravel in Kanchanaburi, Thailand.
